name: Content Content
description:
You are a box and you must fill yourself up with content in order to become content!

--

A game lovingly made by us in a week for our 'content' jam. (Our second game too- nice!) Support us at @sushimuffin04 for more game and miscellany.

--

The other theme you see in the 4th screenshot is accessible by a cheat code. There are a total of 3 cheat codes. Good luck finding them! ;) If you find any, let us know at @sushimuffin04.

--

As this is simply a game jam project, we won't release bug fixes. However, if there is something absolutely game-breaking (= makes the game unplayable), then feel free to reach us at @sushimuffin04 so we can fix it. We still want people to be able to play it!
